title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2173.1 - Corrective or remedial actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2173.1 - Corrective or remedial actions

State Regulations

In formulating appropriate corrective or remedial actions
for performance deficiencies, the corporation will take such actions as it
deems appropriate to prevent a continuation of the deficiency or to mitigate, to the extent possible, its adverse effects or consequences, and to prevent its
recurrence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2173.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
